website_summaries.verdict: If you are on the fence about building with the more advanced gears and pieces of a LEGO Technic set, this little cherry picker is the perfect introduction to the series.
pros: Features a working boom and flexible arm
cons: One of the easier LEGO Technic sets to build

customer_reviews.title: Great starter Technic
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son was able to assemble it with little or no help from his older sister. This was a good starter technic kit for him. He is fascinated by the gear system. Hopefully there will be more such starter technic sets that are not too expensive. Cheers to Lego!
customer_reviews.author: Rajiv

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for a great set
customer_reviews.text: Although it is pretty clear in the pictures that it is not real lego pieces but just the lego company with a buildable truck, I still was surprised. This set is a nice set for a 7 year old to build. It is challenging but definitely age appropriate. It is good quality and you can definitely play with it without worrying that it will break.
customer_reviews.author: Devorah

customer_reviews.title: It is a fun little starting pack for Lego Technic
customer_reviews.text: I think it is one of the simpler, cheapest Lego Technic sets you can buy that has a nice set of pieces to see if you would like the larger sets. If you go online, you find out that you can also build a tow truck out of these pieces. I wish they included the instructions for that in the box as well but they didn't. If you never played with Lego Technic before, note that these pieces are way smaller compared to normal Lego pieces and it is easy to lose them.
customer_reviews.author: Bertan

customer_reviews.title: Great Father Son project
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a weekend I knew me and my son would be at home alone with no girls. We built about 4 sets this 1 was easy to build we used the lego app. Great bonding experience lego never fails
customer_reviews.author: Nsiddons

customer_reviews.title: What a fun Set.
customer_reviews.text: Love challenging my 5 year old with these advanced sets. We do them together and this one was a bit complex for him. But, the reward after getting it set up, especially the alternate build of the tow truck (which you download instructions for online) was totally more than worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: T. Durden

customer_reviews.title: Awesome LEGO set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Look how awesome this LEGO set is for this price! My grandson loved it and has used these pieces to build all kinds of things. Lots of moving parts. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: The Blue Teacup

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and easy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my son. He had to have help putting it together because he is only 7 but the instructions were easy to follow and it turned out great! It's super cute and fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Luna

customer_reviews.title: Good set to get into technic
customer_reviews.text: This is my Sons second technic set, he really likes it. His first set was also one of the small sets just to see if he wanted to make the jump from regular Legos to technics and this is easy enough for a 7 year old but challenging enough to make it fun.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Very cool little set. My boy loved putting together something more complicated than a simple truck. Teaches about screw gears amd lasts pretty well (unless you specifically want to take it apart)
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Cute little introduction in the Lego Technic line
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little introduction in the Lego Technic line that largely avoids Lego's recent tendency to make model-specific pieces that makes things less traditionally Lego.
customer_reviews.author: IBuyTooMuchOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: fun build, sturdy model
customer_reviews.text: This model was a nice build. I liked the design of the lift mechanism. And it is pretty tough, standing up to busy play and being tossed around like toys sometimes experience. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Jim W

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item.
customer_reviews.text: The product is good, but I was sent the tow truck instead of the cherry picker. The kid already opened and started assembling it when we saw it. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Solid LEGO set
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun LEGO set that is easy to assemble. It was perfect for our 12 year old nephew. He ripped it right open and had it built in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Daggett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set of legos, the pieces are unique and not like most other lego sets I've purchased in the past. This was a big hit with my kiddo!
customer_reviews.author: kateruth

customer_reviews.title: Not a traditional LEGO and small
customer_reviews.text: It is not a lot of LEGO bricks but alternative tube construction. Kids did not care for it. Also smaller than I thought from pictures
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson. He loved it and can't stop playing with it. Great little Lego set and good for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: J Capps

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my 7year old sons toy he bought with chore money. Not too complicated, he built it himself in about ten minutes. He loves it and how everything moves.
customer_reviews.author: Carli Reno

customer_reviews.title: One of his favorite gifts!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. Child who received it enjoyed and was very happy with it. Lego is known for its quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts ☹️ my little was so excited to get this. He had a hard time putting it together so I sit down to help. And I realized it was missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: debra foust

customer_reviews.title: birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a Birthday gift for my grandson and thanks to you it arrived the day before his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great first technic set
customer_reviews.text: enjoyed building this with my daughter and she enjoys playing with it. bought it specifically because it has working gears uses to raise and lower the boom.
customer_reviews.author: dodge

customer_reviews.title: Not that sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Did not stay together that great other than that it was easy to build
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Lego for Grandson
customer_reviews.text: Missing one piece from lego kit. Otherwise timely shipping and price reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Hurt my sons fingers. He can do normal legos these are not normal legos. Not fun at all
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wald

customer_reviews.title: Fun item
customer_reviews.text: Great item that my son loved, easy to put together and sturdy once put together.
customer_reviews.author: fidgeans

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a present for Christmas and seems great so far
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Product is smaller than it appears online, but came nicely packaged and arrived quickly. Will be a great Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. Great product. Would have liked the instructions for both ways to put it together but at least they have them online.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Very bad
customer_reviews.text: It was really a bad choice. Extremely difficult to assemble. I didn’t get complete pieces also.
customer_reviews.author: Avinash

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed by an 8 yr old
customer_reviews.text: No challenge for 8 yr old grandson. He was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Pam Ohda

customer_reviews.title: LEGO technic ROCKS....!!!
customer_reviews.text: Turned into a Lego junkie... LOVE the Technic series. Great bonding with grandsons.
customer_reviews.author: any nomus

customer_reviews.title: Super Tricky and frustrating to assemble compared with the standard LEGO sets.
customer_reviews.text: SUPER tricky to put together for my 6-8 year old crew. The instructions were not clear. He puts MANY legos together but this was the first TECHNIC and would NEVER buy again
customer_reviews.author: Katie T

customer_reviews.title: Good price for specialty lego.
customer_reviews.text: 6 year old Grandsons loved them, Assembled mostly by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: XXX

customer_reviews.title: The favorite
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it. He usually pulls them apart after we build them but he keeps playing with this one
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun but not for 3 year old kid.
customer_reviews.author: JOE L

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: My 8 years old nephew loved it and was occupied with it for hours
customer_reviews.author: Kristof Chwalisz

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves it. I had to help with some of the assembly but it is for 7+ The technic LEGO sets are mostly small parts, no bricks. Still cool!
customer_reviews.author: MelBee

customer_reviews.title: Buildings a Pleasure
customer_reviews.text: Excellent attention getter and solver/builder for my 6 year old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Stevela1

customer_reviews.title: It is a bunny in fact
customer_reviews.text: There’s mistake. The label is tech cheery picker but it’s a bunny in fact
customer_reviews.author: Yuanyuan Sun

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: Bought a second set so my son could have the cherry picker and tow truck to use together! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica vogel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my 11 year old nephew
customer_reviews.text: This lego cherry picker set arrived much earlier than expected and will be the perfect gift for my 11 year old nephew who loves to build stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great for you builders
customer_reviews.text: 12 year old boy had a blast building this and playing with it!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: excellent !
customer_reviews.text: we love it and lots of nice parts you won't find in common legos. Great to have. We bought two !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet set
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with these smaller LEGO kits for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Kids like it
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yrs old kid liked it and i had a fun time while helping him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson. Every year for his birthday he asks for Legos. He collected 114 Lego sets this year. Every year he takes them to a local hospital for the children there. It's how he celebrates his twin brother that passed. He is 10 this year.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little Technic set!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect little 'starter' set to teach my son how to assemble LEGO Technic sets. He got it for his birthday on Thursday and has already taken it apart, built the second assembly, and then changed it up a bit to use some different attachments. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Harris

product_meta.title: LEGO Technic Cherry Picker 42088 Building Kit (155 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Help your young LEGO builder understand the basics of gears, force and movement with this cool LEGO Technic 42088 Cherry Picker. This detailed 2-in-1 model comes with realistic functions and features, including a detailed lifting mechanism with working boom and basket, 4 hazard warning lights, 2 warning beacons and chunky tires. Rebuild this 2-in-1 LEGO Technic set to create a robust Tow Truck.
feature_bullets: Build a LEGO Technic Cherry Picker with detailed lifting mechanism, working boom and basket, 4 hazard warning lights, 2 warning beacons and working wheels with chunky tires!
2-in-1 LEGO Technic set: rebuilds into a Tow Truck, Discover the building blocks of real life mechanical machines with realistic LEGO Technic gear mechanisms
155 pieces – For boys and girls aged 7+ and for fans and kids of all ages
This LEGO Technic Cherry Picker 42088 set can be built together with all other original LEGO sets and LEGO bricks for creative building

Cherry Picker (with boom lowered) measures over 2 inches (7cm) high, 5 inches (14cm) long and 1 inches (5cm) wide, and more than 4 inches (12cm) high with boom extended Tow Truck measures over 2 inches (7cm) high, 4 inches (12cm) long and 1 inches (5cm) wide

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars830 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
